name: @logos-notes-exporter/cli
description: A TypeScript CLI tool to export Logos Bible Software notes to Markdown files with YAML frontmatter

scripts.build: tsc && bun build src/cli.ts --outdir dist --target bun
scripts.validate:binary: test -d dist || (echo 'CLI not built. Run: pnpm run build' && exit 1)
scripts.binary:macx64: pnpm run validate:binary && mkdir -p ../../bin/macos-x64 && bun build --compile --target=bun-macos-x64 src/cli.ts --outfile ../../bin/macos-x64/LogosNotesExporter && echo 'macOS x64 binary created successfully'
scripts.binary:macarm: pnpm run validate:binary && mkdir -p ../../bin/macos-arm64 && bun build --compile --target=bun-macos-arm64 src/cli.ts --outfile ../../bin/macos-arm64/LogosNotesExporter && echo 'macOS ARM64 binary created successfully'
scripts.binary:windows: pnpm run validate:binary && mkdir -p ../../bin/windows-x64 && bun build --compile --target=bun-windows-x64 src/cli.ts --outfile ../../bin/windows-x64/LogosNotesExporter.exe && echo 'Windows x64 binary created successfully'
scripts.binary:all: echo 'Creating binaries for all platforms...' && pnpm run binary:macx64 && pnpm run binary:macarm && pnpm run binary:windows && echo 'All platform binaries created successfully!'

author: Logos Notes Exporter
